20. Pilot Manager Class¶

20.1. Pilot Manager Class – sinon.pilot_manager¶

class sinon.api.pilot_manager.PilotManager(url=None, session=None)[source]¶

Bases: sinon.api.attributes.Attributes

PilotManager class.

Notes:
  • cancel() not needed if PM is not a service, i.e. does not have state.
submit_pilot(description, ttype='Sync')[source]¶

Instantiate and return (Compute or Data)-Pilot object

list_pilots(ttype='Sync')[source]¶

Returns pids of known pilots.

get_pilot(pids, ttype='Sync')[source]¶

Reconnect to and return (Compute or Data)-Pilot object(s)

wait_pilot(pids, state=['Done', 'Failed', 'Canceled'], timeout=-1.0, ttype='Sync')[source]¶

Wait for given pilot(s).

cancel_pilot(pids, ttype='Sync')[source]¶

Cancel given pilot(s).
